item.title: A comprehensive guide to Causal Forest
item.description: Disclaimer This guide aims to be a great resource for practitioners of causal forest and wants to empower researchers with this awesome method. Whether you are a researcher keen to throw your data on causal forest or just want to have a glance for the next study, this article is for you. I found myself diving into its source code, published papers on its theory and referring to its algorithm reference.
